dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating visual conversational agents through cooperative human-AI games, focusing on the GuessWhich task where an agent attempts to guess a target image by asking questions.
dcterms:title: GuessWhich

dcterms:creator: Harm de Vries
Florian Strub
Sarath Chandar
Olivier Pietquin
Hugo Larochelle
Aaron C. Courville
dcterms:description: A dataset for visual object discovery through multi-modal dialogue, where an agent asks yes-or-no questions to locate an object in an image.
dcterms:title: GuessWhat

dcterms:creator: Abhishek Das
Satwik Kottur
Khushi Gupta
Avi Singh
Deshraj Yadav
José M.F. Moura
Devi Parikh
Dhruv Batra
dcterms:description: A dataset for visual dialog where a conversational agent answers questions about an image based on a dialog history.
dcterms:title: VisDial

dcterms:creator: Abhishek Das
Satwik Kottur
José M.F. Moura
Stefan Lee
Dhruv Batra
dcterms:description: A dataset for training cooperative visual dialog agents using deep reinforcement learning, focusing on learning effective dialog policies.
dcterms:title: VisDial

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for image captioning and object detection, often used in various visual recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO
